website_summaries.verdict: With both USB ports and traditional power outlets, this charging station does it all!
pros: This is a handy charging station that showcases both USB charging ports as well as traditional outlets, making it dual-purpose
Each side of this station can be turned on individually as desired
Small enough and reliable to travel with as a charging method
cons: One outlet is very close to on/off switch, which makes it hard to use with any large plugs

customer_reviews.title: Great Bedside Charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger is really useful. I keep it at my bedside and plug my iPhone, iPad, lamp, and bluetooth speaker into it. The best part is that I don't have to have a bunch of USB power chargers since I can plug the USB directly into it. The little buttons on it are pretty good too because they're easier to use than the twist knob on my lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Martin

customer_reviews.title: We love our power strip
customer_reviews.text: We love our power strip...you can individually power each side. Bought this when I saw my cousin had one for her kids and their multitude of phones, tablets and game crap. Can't beat the price or convenience. Cord is nice and long too, USB side turns blue when powered on.
customer_reviews.author: Frank W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this charging station.  Perfect for desktop or counter top
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I put in in my daughters room so she can charge her tablet and phone and Xiaomi Mi Fit and whatever else needs charging. She uses it as a stand for her tablet as well. I got it on sale but its definitely one of my favorite charging stations and I've bought a bunch of them.
customer_reviews.author: tlewison

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I travel lot because of work and found the keeping track of many different chargers has become too time consuming and the available outlets are limited at the plants I visit or the hotel I stay at. This device is in my traveling laptop bag and now I can operate my laptop, charge my cell phone, and charge my tablet all from a safe, filtered single outlet source. This a very excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Schmidty

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my travels. any hotel/motel over 6 years old never has outlets where I need them. They rarely have USB ports. This gives me both.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblehead598

customer_reviews.title: Read the item description carefully (Still a good product)
customer_reviews.text: Good product and it works well. Just make sure you read the item description carefully, especially If you charge many gadgets at the same time, USB's are "UP TO 2.4 amps/port", but if all 4 ports are used at the same time, it is a MAXIMUM of 5 amps. I normally do not have more than a couple gadgets plugged in at one time, so the product works well (and charges quickly) for me. Very Happy with this product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... another country and I swear this was the most useful thing I took with me
customer_reviews.text: I recently travelled to another country and I swear this was the most useful thing I took with me. I got to charge my iPod, my iPhone, my 3DS, my computer, and my pocket Wi-Fi all at the same time. I recommend this to anyone who needs to charge a lot of things at once, especially when travelling, where you have very few outlets at your disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Nataku

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This worked great initially, but for no reason, just outside of the return period, it stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: CBR

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up the clutter!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and could not find in stores. With several devices to charge and two lamps and a heating pad to plug in, I had a power strip next to my bed that looked like a mess! This smart power strip gets the job done. I love the separate usb outlets. Everything now has a place and my night stand looks neat and clean. The power strip is no longer a tripping hazard on my floor. I'm going to order another one for my husband's night stand. Very happy with this purchase. It looks nice and is incredibly helpful!
customer_reviews.author: pixie

customer_reviews.title: ... stars is because the cord is so damn short like how is this and extension when it doesn’t extend ...
customer_reviews.text: The product seems okay but the reason I’m giving it one stars is because the cord is so damn short like how is this and extension when it doesn’t extend very much at all, it’s only like two feet longer than my iPhone charger which defeats the purpose for an extension. Worst part about this is the fact I have to pay a return fee you must be joking it made the clutter worst from the cords it doesn’t look neat at all. I got this hoping I can put in a place that wouldn’t be seen and all the wires wouldn’t be so much in your face. But because it’s so short it’s just ugh annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Adiaha Wright

customer_reviews.title: DOA?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it doesnt live up to the stated specs or not, but it wont charge my asus c302 flip chromebook, and it will only slow charge a cell phone. huh? I guess this is either a bad one, or simply other reviews are fake. unsure atm. Had to return. Even the nice ac and usb port extension block they offer can charge my chromebook, although at low charge rate. I guess will have to use that for the time being until I find another charge block for my laptop. oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the needs I had
customer_reviews.text: Using a flat extension cord and this, I was able to put power to the table between recliners in the middle of the room. This makes charging the phones or tables much easier and more convenient! I have yet to have any problems with this, and it feels like a very sturdy build (not the fake "made in notown, cheapcountry!")
customer_reviews.author: L. McNerneyTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Works great - slight design flaw at least in my application
customer_reviews.text: Many connections today, use that damn power bricks, which block adjacent power plugs. In this device, they also block the USB outlets, reducing the utility. If the USB outlets were on the side, or the edge, then the interaction between power bricks and USB ports would be minimized. But from a functional perspective, this device works perfectly, and removed a bunch of clutter between the wall and the end table. Nice product. I may have to see if I can find really short AC extensions to be able to use all the AC and USB stuff, when a power brick AC device is in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: K_R_R

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Update 3/11/19 The manufacturer has tried to make it right by shipping out another replacement. They get a 7 Star rating for going above and beyond with their customer service. Update 2/25/19 The second one came in and once again the USB chargers are having issues this time they are working intermittently. I ordered this surge strip/usb charger in November, finally got around to setting it up the second week of January. All 4 USB ports stopped working 10 says after setting it up. I just received a replacement, I will update my review after a few weeks of usage.
customer_reviews.author: AJass

customer_reviews.title: 3 main oulets don't work defective or broken
customer_reviews.text: The usb outlets work fine for me and light up when pressed, but the the main 3 outlets do not work. Anything plugged in will not turn on. I wanted to plug in my fan for these hot summer months.. but now it cant recieve power because this thing will not work. Now im suffering the heat.... I tried pressing the button multiple times and in different ways, but the lights for the outlet will not turn on. Only had the thing for a month and didnt really do anything to it. It broke by itself or it was defective when I got it. 1 star, shocking because its highly reviewed here.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice power strip
customer_reviews.text: Nice power strip, but beware of the current draw limitations. Had my Pixel plugged into USB and a laptop plugged into 120v, the wife plugged in her iPhone into USB and it started cutting out. Too much current draw I guess. Moved this power strip to the office and bought an Anker power cube for the living room. That one can handle the draw with no issues, in fact it will charge her iPhone, iWatch, my Pixel, and a laptop with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: Gives off annoying blue light.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my bedroom. It's a good compact switch and works well for charging my laptop and phone. I would give it 5 stars but the blue lights emitted from the usb ports are very annoying at night. I can't leave this on the tabletop as it's impossible to sleep with the annoying lights. What's worst is I don't see that they serve any purpose. I haven't returned the switch because I could use it elsewhere, but am disappointed that I can't use in bedroom because the size is perfect to use on bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: LA Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all your charging or electric needs within arms reach
customer_reviews.text: It's a very handy and compact power strip. The cable is very flexible and not as stiff as your average power strip. I keep mine on the table by the couch so I can easily plug my phone in to charge or plug in my PS4 controller when it's on low battery or my phone. It gives a very quick charge which is nice. It also works well when I plug in my wireless charging pad for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lippold

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 weeks then DIED!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hospice nurse with several electronic devices that have to be charged every evening so I can do my job the next day. This recharging station looked nice on my desk but only lasted about 3 weeks then it DIED! The indicator lights showed it had power and was charging, after being tested again, found it was no longer functioning. I had a miserable next day at work trying to find places to charge my gear between patients. It was given a proper burial in the trash bin as I didn't have the time or patience to find a box and send it back and I doubt it would have made a difference. Hard earned money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home charging stations
customer_reviews.text: We have at least 6 of these power strips and use them for charging stations located strategically throughout the house. The USB ports work very well and the multiple plugs are convenient. Very reliable over the past couple of years. I leave various usb cords attached and also attach a wireless charger next to them. Great for multiple family members and/or guests to use. I also take the set-up with me when traveling for stays at vacation rentals, etc. Very convenient. ( Please note: unit should be plugged into a surge protector strip because it lacks internal protection for your devices.)
customer_reviews.author: sprucehen

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in May 2019. It worked great. In December, I had trouble with one of the USB ports not charging. The company responded to my problem and sent me a replacement. Ver satisfied with the product and the customer service. I like using this to keep all of our phones and readers charged. I will be using in overseas travel along with my travel adapter so I can plug in my other items like my electric toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Literally, the very first time I pressed the on/off button, the button popped off and would not stay on. I had previously purchased another iClever product - a mini one of these - and the on/off button stopped working within about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Second box same problem
customer_reviews.text: I originally reviewed this and you gave it one star because it gave off a whining noise which bothered me so close to my head on the night table. The company offered to send me a new one if I would change my review, I agreed. The new one work like a charm for about 6 months and now it's whining in the same way that the first one did. I don't know if there is a fan or what inside of their and I love my box otherwise. I just wish it would stop with the noise!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri883

customer_reviews.title: Overall a really good product. Getting power off of the outlet and ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a really good product. Getting power off of the outlet and into a more convenient place is wonderful. The lack of a power indicator with the button can be frustrating. I had a USB cable that was near the end of its life and a bit fussy. I couldn't tell if the power was on or if the cable was acting up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lehnhardt

customer_reviews.title: Power and convenience with a functional design and size!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about convenient! The iClever surge protector and USB charger is a must have for anyone like me who charges multiple devices and needs additional outlets. I have this on my desk and charge my phone, tablet and Bluetooth headset and speaker with it. I also have the ability to plug in two or three devices via the outlet, I use one for my laptop for example. I would love to see an updated version of this which includes power indicator lights, but really that's about it. I will be buying another one for my office desk as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frylock

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you don't have wide AC adapters.
customer_reviews.text: If the outlets could swivel or be spaced to accommodate wide AC adapters, then I'd be a happy camper! Otherwise, I'm currently limited to 2 plugs. Also, the USB slots light up blue when plugged in. Pressing the power button "off" does not turn the blue lights off... just FYI for those who might be sensitive. EDIT: The USB lights DO turn off after pressing the power button "off". (Thanks iClever for responding!)
customer_reviews.author: Marmalade

customer_reviews.title: Loose plugs.. wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: plugs for power are very loose in strip, they slide in and out way to easily. concerning... **UPDATE** After posting this review I was contacted by ThousandShores customer service. They shipped me another product to try to rectify the problem I had with the first unit. Unfortunately the replacement unit had the same issue as it appears to be a manufacturing issue. I've kept my original unit and do use it, I'm just not a fan of loose plugs. That being said, the customer service I received was excellent, and I would easily purchase from these guys again knowing they take customer feedback very seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Pilkington

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The plugs inside the unit keep falling out when I plug something in. They aren’t very secure inside there. I’ve opened it up twice to repair them. Not great. Update; they saw my review and emailed me, asking me to take it down if they sent me a new one. They sent me a new one, and it does work better than the first one, so I updating the review and adding a star. It’s a handy product to have and eliminates the need for adapters on my desk and nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 4 months, but now the USB ports are intermittently working. Update: The company emailed me relentlessly to replace this product. When I declined because I use this in my bedroom and the blue light that is emitted from the USB port is not conducive to sleeping, they sent me a new one anyway. They then requested I update this post. So while it did break, the company would very much like to compensate you for the product if it does not work as described.
customer_reviews.author: E. Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any of the problems others have noted. I did put a square piece of non-skid pad underneath the bottom to keep it from sliding around on the table. As a design suggestion, I would move the slot for the cell phone to the outside of side instead of the middle. I have a cord plugged in all of the slots, so the cords get in the way as I put the phone in the slot or take it out. Otherwise, it is working well and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good item and I like that it had 3 electrical outlets as the other similar products have two. The separate switch is nice. Good charging station for all your USB's at home and when traveling. In foreign countries you'll need only one plug adaptor if your items are dual voltage. I liked the design of having the groove to hold the phone when it is charging. But it is not big enough for a phone with a case so that feature didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: broke switch to easy
customer_reviews.text: I buy 2 power strips one of the product no longer work but they respond with a replacement very prompt I don't know what happen if it was a factory defect but I'm very satisfied with the costumer services the product looks very nice I'm waiting for the new replacement
customer_reviews.author: max. machacdo

customer_reviews.title: Have to throw it away
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a few months back then used it for the first time tonight. Plugged 4 USB devices into it then noticed the USB plugs getting hot as hell. Almost hurt to the touch. Yeah I'll take "Ways to not burn my house down" for 200 Alex.
customer_reviews.author: Deetro

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This plug/adapter works just as advertised. It is very well built with a thick sturdy power cord and well made box. Not flimsy at all. I used it on my desk to charge my two cell phones, my smart watch and my e-reader with the USB sockets. It is much more convenient than having a power strip with 3 different power adapters plugged in and the wires all streaming up to my desk. The amperage is high enough that I get a very fast charge on all of my devices. The standard plugs are very handy as well for the one adapter I have which is not a detachable USB.
customer_reviews.author: Al F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer support from iClever company
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the plug side of the unit doesn't work. I submitted a warranty support ticket to iClever via their website but never got a response. Since the USB port side DOES work, I was hoping to avoid an amazon return. One week later, given the poor customer support, it looks like my only option is to return the item and repurchase it. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied at all!
customer_reviews.text: I first started to use this on Jan 5, 2018. the regular outlet plugs never worked right and now they don't work at all. the USB plugs do not turn on and off with the individual switch.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Gadget Lovers Rejoice - The Charging Nightmare Solved!
customer_reviews.text: Extra nice being able to plug all my electronics in at one place instead. Compact yet robust charging strip. Like that the USB side and outlet sides have separate power buttons. The phone holder notch is a neat little bonus too. Well made, attractive, and extremely functional. Fast charges my Nexus 5X via the USB C port. I am buying more of these right now. I think would make an excellent gift, especially for the gadget lover or geek in your life. Would love to see this in black. Awesome job iClever!
customer_reviews.author: DigitalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says- flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger, I love that it has shut-off buttons- this way if I have my lamp plugged in, I dont have to shut it off at the lamp, I can just get it at the plug. I was looking for something I could take with me when traveling to plug in all electronics in a hotel or something and this def checks all the boxes. Quality feel and works great, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: I liked the long cord and everything
customer_reviews.text: I got a defected one, usb didn't recognize s8 plus and never fast charged but ac side it did. If usb worked, I would've given 5 stars. I liked the long cord and everything else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, portable - 3 plugs too close together
customer_reviews.text: Great size and balance between plugs and USB. Probably a little bulky for traveling but works great in my office. Like the on-off button for each side but not sure I’ll ever use it. Only gripe is the placement of the 3 plugs with transformer plugs, you can only use 2 if you’re using transformers, putting the 3rd plug on the side with the USB ports would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Fritts

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR ESK8 CHARGING STATION
customer_reviews.text: Great charging station for my ESK8 equipment. 3 eboards with chargers combined total 8A, and with the shredlights dual and quad usb cables i can charge 3 remotes, 4 shredlights, a headlamp battery, a flashlight, a bluetooth speaker, and red tail light all at the same time. Also a great way to protect my boards while they're plugged in from surges.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This is great. Can control power to either or both with ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed both USB charger and 3 prong electrical outlet. This is great. Can control power to either or both with a push button. 3 grounded outlets, 4 USB ports. Discreet appearance, (black). Not the tiniest object on my desk-but under a desk in would be considered fairly compact. For its size it is relatively light-weight but still feels sturdy. For someone who needs lots of options it would take up more space than weight in a sutcase or laptop bag. All in all would recommend. Seller delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Ex- shoe seller

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Utility
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing power extender. Unlike traditional power strips, this is square and much more stable. The USB charging ports along with standard power outlets make this a great way to neatly plug in your devices on a desktop without a bunch of extra wire and adapters hanging off an extension cord. This is also reasonably priced when it comes to power strips.
customer_reviews.author: JettaRed

customer_reviews.title: iClever receives a five star rating from me consistent quality products
customer_reviews.text: I love the iClever brand. This product is excellent for traveling or home use. I have several iClever Products and will continue to purchase them for myself and for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sue

customer_reviews.title: Works great except for a few small annoyances
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my bedside and although I generally like it, there are two annoyances. First, there’s an humming noise that seems to come and go. I can stop it by turning off the unit using the switches but obviously that undermines the purpose. Seems to go away when I plug things in. Second, the blue lights in the USB plugs are very bright at night so I have to plug in cords I don’t use or cover the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging phones. OK for plugs
customer_reviews.text: Does what I expected. This allows me to charge my tablets and phones without having to have the bricks drawing current from the wall all the time. Also, if you have a Qi charger or a phone that is finicky about getting enough current, this should provide all the current it needs. The standard plugs are good as well although they are a little close for some of my wall warts. (edit 3/1/2017) Downgraded the review from 4 stars to 2. The product itself was fine. However, since I didn't give a 5 star review, the vendor has been pestering me via email ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sprite

customer_reviews.title: Ok electrical output (less than advertised but functional), warranty support nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: Well, even with only two of the four USB connections able to output the full 2.4, I was relatively happy with this until it died last week. Unfortunately, the company does not stand behind their warranty, so I will need to buy a new one. As others have noted, the advertised versus the true output are different numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Only 25 watts total--not enough to charge four iPads
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as 12 watts per port (2.4a and 5V per port) -- but the total is just 25 watts across all ports, instead of the 48 watts needs to provide full power for 4 ports going at the same time. When I plugged in two iPads and 2 iPhones--it keep disconnecting and re-connecting each device. Not sure if defective, but will be returning to buy a unit with more total watts.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Faulty USB Ports.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Manufacturer sent me a replacement, everything works fine now. 4 stars for hassle, i'm not sure how long it will last, but all usb ports and power ports work. The old one i opened up and looked inside and has some pretty shoddy work inside...but for price i'll give it a go. Original: USB ports don't work, just power outlet. Press button no LED lights..if you press it a lot real fast the lights come on but still no power to USB ports..it then turns off led lights. Its not worth my time to drive 30min to drop off to return sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Dranzerk

customer_reviews.title: Charge everything in ONE PLACE w/ONE Surge Protector!
customer_reviews.text: One spot charging !! With the SMART USB connections - I do not have to guess - it's smart enough to know. I go to bed with EVERYTHING in one place - all charged for the next day. iPhone, iPad, Air Pods, ALEXA,, light speaker & the beside lamp. The foot print of the device it’s self is SO SMALL – compared to buying a FULL SIZE surge protector. And most surge protectors only come with 2 USB slots (if any at all) and they are not “smart USBs”. I’ve purchased one for travel and one for the office. This little device makes my life easy and dare I say it ... organized.
customer_reviews.author: Redmond Living

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution
customer_reviews.text: This is mainly being used at home for a desktop power source (instead of the strip on the floor). I have to tell you it is serving my needs even better than I thought it would. And the versatility is really good. Bought another for the living room, may get yet another to throw in my work laptop case for hotel rooms. Really great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Buzby

customer_reviews.title: No Problems. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the end table in our living room. Liked it so much, I bought a second one for my night stand in my bedroom. Works great. I really like the on off buttons. Sits flat. Stays in place. Looks nice too. I bought a black one but I actually prefer the white because I can see it better at night.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanders

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to replace a similar station that stopped working. I thought it was the cords, but it was the station itself...but so far this one seems to be working. the plug ins are VERY tight...i didnt think they worked at all at first but you really have to wiggle the plugs into them and they work.
customer_reviews.author: momarch

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: One of the power buttons fell off as I opened the box. I pressed it back on and it seems to be holding but it's now set much further into the base than the other one. Very loud click as the power is switched on and off. My Samsung S7 phone is now charging, but not on a fast charge. UPDATE: I have never experienced customer support as good as I did on this product. They were quick to respond and remedy the situation. I would return to this brand in a heartbeat if that is how they treat a customer. Bravo.
customer_reviews.author: Bdub

customer_reviews.title: Best charger outlet I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I love this... I boughy it for work, instead of having to find an open outlet, I just plug this in have three more outleys and four USB charging ports. Works amazingly. I have three now, have had my first one for over two years now. I have one in the bed room, one in the living room, and one for work. I also take one on trips just very convenient to travel with. Chargers my LG V30, Samsung S8, and Nintendo Switch with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: J & P Barr

customer_reviews.title: Needs a design change
customer_reviews.text: So I like the charger but it has a fatal flaw in my opinion. The USB ports, when turned on, light up blue. I'm not sure who thought it was a good idea that that a bedside nightstand charger should light up. But they really need to change that design. It projects light all over the ceiling of my room.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: All work flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Sockets as well as the USB's work as described. Well made and feels sturdy. The only thing I would have liked to see is a way to fit it on a wall, ideally a screw in utilizing the socket mounting screw. Having said that, I do like the control where you are treated to two buttons on off switch for the sockets and the USB's. and it is good for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards and Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set Up
customer_reviews.text: got a few of these for our vacation rental to put by each bedside. Renters love them with the ability to USB charge or straight plug them in. We went with these instead of alarm clocks (you have a smart phone right?) Only thing I don't like is they project a blue light to the ceiling. If you don't mind soft light while you sleep not a big deal, but I like it dark.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for output of up to 1250W, much more than needed for just a few little electronics.
customer_reviews.text: Literally perfect. Exactly what I was looking for. Heavier/sturdy construction. Purchased one for our living room & one for the bathroom. We have multiple things that need to be plugged in in both rooms. May even buy a few more to use in other rooms. Makes collecting cables for all of our electric toothbrushes/shavers easy. And definitely comes in handy when we need to have multiple phones/usb charged electronics charging next to our couch. I actually wall mounted both with command strips. A+++
customer_reviews.author: tattoocat

customer_reviews.title: worked well for awhile
customer_reviews.text: it worked fine for awhile until the buttons fell off. I had it in the closet for awhile and when I went to retrieve it the button to turn on/off fell off. hesitant to use after this. REVISED REVIEW: this review was read by the company who sent me a brand new one. Thus far works well and I will give further results after use.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilled its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I especially like that you can turn off the power to the individual outlets when not in use. That way, I can leave my items plugged in and just turn off the power for the strip. The strip where I can stand up my phone is very good for using my phone as my clock. However, if I'm charging my phone (Samsung Galaxy s7) I need to lay it on it's side (which is not the fault of this product). One note - my fast charger for my Galaxy didn't fast charge through this strip. I had to plug it directly into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: HawaiianMom

customer_reviews.title: Solid Unit
customer_reviews.text: I neede Low voltage and short circuit protection. It comes with two switches and a warning light. It’s compact and made of sturdy materials and should pack and travel well. I only use it at home for the moment. I keep it on a bed stand to charge phone and other electronics that have USB.
customer_reviews.author: raj from chicagoTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I went with this brand was for the Individual Control Switch for the ubs, but it wasn't working correctly which was disappointing but I did find another brand on Amazon that lights up when it's on so that should help. Update: They were good enough to send me out another one that works fine. They were good to deal with, good customer service. A+
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C

customer_reviews.title: Another Misleding CHINESSE ITEM Sold by amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of the products, cable is long enough and it theory according to description: [Intelligent USB Charger]: 4 USB Charging Ports with our SmartID Technology, each port supply the maximum charging allowed by your device (up to 5V/2.4A) So it says you can have every port charging at 2.4A for a total of 9.6 but it's not. You can only have 2 ports working at full capacity, and they do work at full capacity fast charging my phone, only 2 ports are usable at same time.. for small phones do charge good.
customer_reviews.author: Filiberto

customer_reviews.title: Emits a high pitch noise with USB charging
customer_reviews.text: When using it to charge my phone, it didn't make the noise, but if I plug in my portable battery to charge, that pulls more power from the unit, and the unit makes a high pitch noise. I suspect this is the embedded transformer for the USB AC to DC conversion. Have to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is just exactly what I wanted! Compact, efficient (I love being able to turn off the powers when not in use.) I keep it on my bedside table. and now I don't have to root around under the bed looking for outlets in the dark. I also like the groove so I can perch my iPad there for movie viewing. I bought this after reading a favorable review in the travel section of my Sunday paper.I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while now, and wanted to test it out before reviewing it. Conclusion? It's GREAT! Super convenient. I have other power strips, so outlets aren't the problem, but the option to plug in usb cables without any wall-plug is AWESOME! I also love how I can press a button to cut power to the different sections. All in all, I'd definitely buy it again and will absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Saiyuki53

customer_reviews.title: My first choice
customer_reviews.text: I love this one. A nice study size the cord is really thick and just seems like good quality. I have another one of these ports but I like this one much better and will definitely take this one when we travel. Definitely worth the money and doesn't feel cheap. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Kay Dee

customer_reviews.title: Under bed utility
customer_reviews.text: Separate Switch Control] iClever BoostStrip IC-BS02 Smart Power Strip | USB Charger with 4 USB + 3 AC Outlets, Dual Switch Control Charging Station and Phone/Tablet Stand - White is used under the bed and/or top of the night stand. I like the duo choices and the on/off switches per side.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have had no problems in the 2 months I been using it. I do like how you can turn each side on or off. So when leaving the house I just push the button and go, no need to unplug the unit. It does have fast charging ports which was very important to me. It is used every day and the only thing small down side is at night the blue light can be pretty bright.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Great if your desk is cluttered with lots of devices
customer_reviews.text: I do security testing on everything from networks to mobile phone apps, so at any given time, my desk is cluttered with two laptops, my personal phone, and an assortment of phones and tablets for testing. The four USB outlets make it easy to charge and organize all the mobiles devices, plus it has three regular AC outlets for other things like desk fans or laptop AC adapters. I also travel for work often, so it's handy to be able to grab my laptop's power brick right from here and not have to go crawling under the desk to untangle it.
customer_reviews.author: D. HELTON

customer_reviews.title: Great for Vape charging, very handy
customer_reviews.text: I can charge 4 Vapes at a time in the USB ports plus my phone and one other plug-in device the electrical outlet side (there are 3 plug-in outlets, but realistically with the size of most plugs these days you can only fit 2 plugs at a time), plus individual button control over each side (USB ports/electric plug in side) so I can "shut off" one side if I am not using it while keeping the other side "live", very handy. This is a really nice item, I hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Flanamom

customer_reviews.title: 2.4A USB does not "fast charge"
customer_reviews.text: Received this today. So far seems nice, the 3 prong outlets are nicely spaced for clunky plugs. I'm unhappy because the whole reason i bought this is to replace our Samsung Galaxy S6 phone fast chargers and the 2.4A Smart Charge on this boost strip does not fast charge. (Yes, its the strip and not my phone or cords. I tested this morning. )
customer_reviews.author: Jacob N.

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget - converted end table
customer_reviews.text: I was fascinated with the end tables with built in charging stations but not willing to pay the price and I really didn't need a new table anyway. I ordered this and attached it to the back of my existing table using command strips. Voila! I made my own charging station end table. I love how now I only have one cord to plug into the wall instead of 3!
customer_reviews.author: SALLY A CZUBIK

customer_reviews.title: Great for devices - bought one for each bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much I bought a second one for the guest room. It has 4 USB plugs for devices PLUS 3 standard 3-prong plugs (for your lamp or fan or anything else). It also serves as a night light since it lights up on both sides. I also like the fact that you can turn OFF the power during the day or when not in use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SuperReviewr

customer_reviews.title: The versatility is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with this item. The versatility is fantastic. I purchased this to help my daughter and her friends, with their collage courses. They can charge their phones and run their laptops at the same time. Worked out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Miles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Feels high quality, works very well. I don’t understand the purpose of the on/off buttons, but they don’t affect the functionality. The only issue I have is the bright blue LED light that shines from the USB ports. I use it on my night stand, so the blue light shines bright enough to be annoying at night. Some USB dust covers solved that for me
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Zero problems with it.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing special about it. It's just a simple power strip with USB in it. I have had zero problems, which is exactly what I want. Being able to push a button the reset the USB ports comes in handy if the Fire TV stick becomes unresponsive, I can just click-click and it resets without having to pull it out and put it back.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ericksen

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year and never tried it until today. None of the four USB chargers work. I should have tried it when I got it. Lesson learned. It would be wonderful 5 stars if it worked. *****Recieved a replacement from the manufacture and am extremely happy with this product! Love that I can charge several devices at the same time. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful on end table
customer_reviews.text: Have this on an end table in the living room and find it super useful for random items that need to be plugged in (eg laptop, phones, etc). The on-off buttons are nice and how stable it is, since it does not tend to move around much.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good device!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a cruise. Everything I read said there weren't enough outlets. VERY TRUE. Good: 4 USB ports and 3 AC outlets. Cord is reasonable length. Push button to turn things on and off. Not as good: plugging in 4 iPhones to the 4 USB ports exceeds the maximum power draw. I didn't do any math, it was trial and error. Switched one to the AC and all was well. One of the white buttons came off in my bag. Easily put back into place but it should probably be a tad more secure. For the money, you should absolutely buy this! Worked like a champ. Great plan for my cruise.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad someone makes something like this. I wanted a central power/usb supply for my patio table and this fit the bill. Cord goes through hole in table that is normally used for an umbrella. Looks much nicer than having an ugly extension cord on the surface of the table. I like that the usb ports have a blue back-light.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Let ME do it!
customer_reviews.text: I've put this terrific product into a decorative box on my bathroom counter. Looks fabulous sitting there, and when it's in use it doesn't let all those cables spread everywhere. Thanks for this easy solution! I even travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Useful for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in cruise ship cabin since having something that multiplies plugs and USB ports is a necessity (most cruise ship cabins have one American and one European recepticle. Naturally this makes at home charging better but for that I would recommend a five USB CHARGER.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: This surge protector is the perfect size and with four usb power slots
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the USB slots don't light up as shown in the one product picture. This surge protector is the perfect size and with four usb power slots, there is plenty of room for many desktop devices. The 3 standard AC plugs are really handy to have accessible on your desk; no more crawling around on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We bought them for a vacation rental house for guests' convenience in plugging in. We've received great responses. The only issue is that some electronics with bigger plugs means you won't be able to use all three plugs at the same time. But that's an issue with most power strips.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Keep all your devices charged in one place. But beware of smartID openings
customer_reviews.text: Works well for 3 electric cords and also quickly recharges 4 power cords. One negative aspect is when I wanted to click the power button off I accidentally touched the SmartID slot and got zapped.
customer_reviews.author: LichenFinder

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that the power strip is compact enough to fit on top of my nightstand to plug in multiple devices. Great quality - very sturdy. I also took it on vacation and it came in handy since multiple people were able to plug in their devices in one location as well. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Stay organized
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands side of the bed because I was tired of seeing his millions of cords scattered all over the place. The intention of this product is that you can set it flat and prop your phone up in the divider, but surface area on his small nightstand is quite valuable, so I mounted it to the wall with some command strips. Works great plugging in his usb c phone, air filter, iPad charger, light, and everything else pluggable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love the Separate Switches
customer_reviews.text: The separate switch control is the biggest selling point for me. I can turn off my beside lamp and leave the phone and iPad charging. The switch is easy to find and use in the the dark. The fact that I've had this for 4 months and everything works great is just the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G Hankins

customer_reviews.title: My outlets are under my desk and not easily accessible. Plugging this in and placing it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This device has been a back saver. My outlets are under my desk and not easily accessible. Plugging this in and placing it on my desk has made it much easier to charge laptops as necessary and even freed up space for phone chargers since it has usb ports in addition to the 3 power outlets. Great product, I'm considering buying another for my desk at work!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: (No longer)Buzzes so badly I can't use it....Updating my review from one star to five because a brand new one appeared at my home unexpectedly from a very observant CS department. The new one works silently, flawlessly. Amazing that my review mattered enough for this company to replace it without my asking. Thank you! Ten stars if possible!
customer_reviews.author: Skyjester105

customer_reviews.title: Super nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger! I have an iPhone X and when I have the case on it, it doesn't fit all the way in the slot to hold the phone, but it fits enough where it doesn't fall. Everything seems to work well and it looks sleek on my desk and not bulky like a normal power strip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my nightstands
customer_reviews.text: I got one for each side of my bedroom nightstands. There's one outlet behind the bed, which makes it hard to use. The long cord on these made it easy to route power, and because it's all integrated much tidier as well. I plugged a lamp into the standard outlet on the unit, and love the separate power buttons as I can easily turn on and off the lamp with that switch, but the charge ports stay powered on.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ellazar

customer_reviews.title: iclever multiple devices, multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected. You can shut it off with the click of a button. You can charge just about anything.... apple products, smart phones, etc. Many ports to charge everything all at once, including electrical outlets to charge laptops, etc. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: enidgh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for charging multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy on my night stand. There are never enough plugs available for charging phones and tablets. This works nicely and takes up little room. I have a night light, small personal fan, and cords for charging my phone and tablet. Can turn off fan and light with one button. Sweet!
customer_reviews.author: MaxieBL

customer_reviews.title: This is really useful and well thought out
customer_reviews.text: This is just such a great help. You've got multiple plug ins and a thought place to set your cell phone. It's got a great price and will be perfect to take on trips as well. If you ever cruise, they really short change you on the outlets. This will solve that which is an extra plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great charging station !
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the bathroom, the USB for charging Fitbits and mobile phones and the outlets for a hot comb and charging my electric razor and beard trimmer etc. The on-off switches are handy to make sure you don't forget to unplug something and overcharge a battery. Handy for nightstand, kitchen or home office.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Humming from two different units, worried about fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: I had two units that I purchased at about the same time. Both developed humming noises from two different outlets on two different breakers. I Google search revealed that this humming could be a warning that the product runs a risk of overheating and catching fire. For the price, there are a lot of options, never mind the humming being massively annoying, it’s not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to keep your devices organized
customer_reviews.text: With online school this fall, I wanted one place to plug in all of our devices at once. I have 3 kids' ChromeBooks and a tablet plugged in in one place and it's great not having cords all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Power Strip with USB, iClever USB Charging Station with 3 Outlet 4 USB Ports, 10A 5ft Extension Cord, Dual Switch Control, Overload Protection, Phone Tablet Stand for Home, Office and Hotel - White
product_meta.description:
Color:White

iClever - Ever Clever

This iClever BoostStrip Series IC-BS02 Power Strip turns one 3-prong outlet into 3 AC outlets with surge protection and 4 USB ports with SmartID technology. Designed with 2 individual control switch to separately control performance of AC outlets and and USB ports, it is easy to cut power for a complete shutdown when not in use to conserve energy. Ideal for home or office, this power strip gives ultimate convenience and protection for computer electronics, home entertainment systems, digital USB devices and more.

Features:
- Unibody 3-prong plug, high strength, safe and durable to use
- UL817 certified 18AWG power cable guarantees safe performance under 1250W/10A condition
- Unibody shell and 94V0 fire-proof materials can bear high temperature up to 750 Celcius degrees, much safer and reliable
- Premium phosphor copper design with 0.5mm thickness has strong electricity conductivity and great heat dissipation, 5000+ hot-swapping supported
- Compared with ordinary power strips, this one adopts individual control switches to separately control AC outlets and USB ports operation
- AC outlets equipped with surge protection to prevent from damages caused by voltage fluctuates, swells or spikes
- USB ports with over-voltage, over-current and high temperature protections give fast and safe charging for your devices

Specifications:
- Rated Power: 125V/Max. 10A 1250W
- AC Input: AC 100-240V 50-60Hz
- USB Output: 4*USB, 5V/Max 2.4A per port
- USB Power: 25W(total 5V/5A output)
- Dimension: 4.9 x 4.9 x 1.57 Inches (125 x 125 x 40 mm)
- Weight: 12 OZ (342g)

Package Content:
- 1 x iClever IC-BS02 Power Strip
- 1 x User Manual
- 1 x Warranty Card

FOR YOUR SAFETY, PLEASE DO ENSURE THAT THE LOAD POWER NOT EXCEED THE RATED POWER OF 1250W.
feature_bullets: [Continuous Power Supply] - This slim desktop charger features 1250W rated power with 3 AC outlets and security current up to 10 amps, saving you from plugging multiple charging cubes,6 Feet Portable Extension Cord satisfies your device need.

[Seperate & Overload Switch] - Individual control switches let you manually control output to USB and AC ports; circuit automatically breaks off when the current exceeds threshold, preventing plugged-in high temperature devices from fire, sparks or other damages,overload switch helps to reset and restore.

[Intelligent USB Charger] - 4 USB Charging Ports with our SmartID Technology, each port supply the maximum charging effeict allowed by your device (up to 5V/2.4A),fit into luggage and briefcases during your trip outside.

[Safe & Reliable] - Over-current,short-circuit and over-temperature protected USB charging port armor your smart device; 94V0 fire-proof materials can bear high temperature up to 750 Celcius degrees, much safer and reliable.

[What you get] - iClever 3 AC 4 USB Power Strip| Charging Dock, User Manual. Our friendly and reliable customer service will respond to you within 24 hours! 18 month worry free or 30 days refund supported and of course lifetime support service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,607 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
